perturbation.original_text: Affiliate(s) are the entities listed on Exhibit E to this Agreement that are either business units of Distributor (and therefore wholly-owned and a part of Distributor) or are wholly-owned subsidiaries of Distributor, but in either case, only for so long as ownership remains as defined in this provision.
perturbation.changed_text: Affiliate(s) are the entities listed on Exhibit E to this Agreement that are either business units of Distributor (and therefore wholly-owned and a part of Distributor) or are wholly-owned subsidiaries of Distributor, regardless of ownership.
perturbation.explanation: This changes the definition of Affiliates by removing the condition that they must remain wholly-owned. This creates a contradiction as other sections rely on the original definition.

perturbation.original_text: Product means, individually or collectively as appropriate, Hardware, licensed Software, Documentation, developed products, supplies, accessories, and goods to the foregoing, listed on the then-current published Global Price List.
perturbation.changed_text: Product means, individually or collectively as appropriate, Hardware and licensed Software, whether or not listed on the then-current published Global Price List.
perturbation.explanation: This creates a contradiction in the definition of 'Product'. Initially, it only includes items on the Global Price List, but the modified definition includes Hardware and licensed Software regardless of listing, which means other definitions relying on this definition become unclear. This also leads to the interpretation of how certain clauses are enforced, and if they are even enforceable.

perturbation.original_text: Reseller means an authorized reseller of Distributor that meets Cisco's then-current requirements for resellers, including, without limitation, the requirements set out in Section 26.0 of this Agreement. In the event Cisco enters into authorization agreements whereby Cisco authorizes particular resellers to purchase Products or Services from Distributor and to resell Products or Services to End User, then "Reseller" shall mean a reseller that is a party to such an authorization agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Reseller means any entity that purchases products from the Distributor for the purpose of resale to end users, regardless of whether they meet Cisco's requirements or have an authorization agreement.
perturbation.explanation: This changes the meaning of Reseller to be any entity reselling, removing any requirements by Cisco. This creates a contradiction as other sections of the contract rely on the authorized definition in relation to liability.
